name: brightcoveAPI
description: on = enables brightcove video, off = disables all brightcove video and displays text instead

name: marketDataAPI
description: on = adds live market data on to each article, off = hides market data from user

name: articleRelatedContent
description: on = shows the related content component in an article, off = hides it from the user

name: contentApiCalls
description: on = enables client side requests for content from CAPI, off = disables all requests

name: ads
description: on = shows the ads component, off = hides it from the user

name: clientErrorReporting
description: on = sends client side errors to sentry, off = turns off the error handling

name: analytics
description: on = turns on ijento analytics, off = turns off analytics

name: userPreferencesAPI
description: on = enables user preference features (following, recommend, etc.) , off = disables them

name: follow
description: following of topics

name: saveForLater
description: saving an article for later

name: recommend
description: ability to recommend articles to groups

name: search
description: on = search is available in the header, off = no search fetaure is visible

name: globalNavigation
description: on = global navigation is in the header, off = no global navigation present

name: javascript
description: on = client side javascript will run, off = no client side javascript will run

name: polyfills
description: on = The polyfill service will be requested, off = There will be no polyfills and non-core features will not work in some browsers

name: searchSuggestions
description: on: displays topics related to a given search; off: no search suggestions provided

name: alphasurvey
description: on = shows the alpha feedback survey, off = hides it

name: moreOnImages
description: on=display images in the more-on streams on an article

name: pagination
description: Pagination results pages

name: mediaInStream
description: on = images/video display on cards in streams

name: galleries
description: on=show slideshows on streams and articles

name: stickyNavigation
description: on: make the nav sticky, off: make the nav not sticky

name: beacon
description: on = enables tracking to the next click-side web beacon, off = disables beacon tracking

name: homePageMyPageFeed
description: on: adds a section for a my page feed on homepage, off: removes it

name: homePageLoadMore
description: on=allows loading of second row of articles on homepage

name: elasticSearchItemGet
description: on = an enabled application will use the mget (elasticSearch powered) method to fetch items

name: typeahead
description: on: metatag based autocompletion enabled for site search, off: no autocompletion

name: slurp
description: on = Enable features that use the slurp API for more relevant metadata e.g. related topics in stream

name: barriers
description: on = Users who do have access, or are not logged in will see something telling them what to do to access content, off = They will be redirected to ft.com

name: optInOut
description: on = Enables users to opt in/out of using Next and shows an opt-out button on Next footer, off = Disables feature, hides button on Next

name: relatedVideoInStream
description: Shows videos in right hand column of swell streams

name: featuredArticlesHack
description: Hack to use existing metadata to flag a few articles in each stream as featured

name: storyPackagesInStream
description: Shows story packages next to selected articles in streams

name: bundledNewsInStream
description: Groups news items into two column bundles in the stream

name: responsiveAds
description: On - Request responsive ad creatives, Off - stick with traditional, fixed-size

name: richMediaAds
description: On - Request rich media ad creatives, Off - show only static ads.  Note that this flag is only valid if the responsive ads flag is OFF.

name: articleTOC
description: Show a table of contents on articles with > 1 subheader.

name: fullWidthMainImages
description: Show full width main images on articles.

name: authGate
description: For Testing Only!!

name: accessGate
description: For Testing Only!!

name: myPageOnboarding
description: UI to encourage people to add topics on first visit to mypage

name: myPageExplanationOverlay
description: on=show overlay explaining what my page is

name: imageServiceIcons
description: use image service to output svg icons with png fallback

name: welcomePanel
description: Show the Next welcome panel

name: mentionsV2
description: Start showing mentions (on articles) from CAPI v2

name: articleComments
description: Show comments on articles

name: articleCommentsHack
description: Tries to use FT.com as an API to figure out whether to show comments or not.  *Must* not be used after the end of Q2.

name: semanticStreams
description: Streams generated from semantic metadata

name: nextBlogpost
description: Show a link to the FT prototype blogpost on the welcome panel

name: dummyFlag
description: Ignore this!
